t: Nautica Opco LLC Company Profile | New York, NY | Competitors, Financials & Contacts - Dun & Bradstreet
s: Nautica Opco LLC is located in New York, NY, United States and is part of the Men's Clothing Manufacturing Industry. Nautica Opco LLC has 3,300 total employees across all of its locations and generates 0 million in sales (USD). There are 145 companies in the Nautica Opco LLC corporate family.

Today, Nautica is one of the most recognized American brands throughout the world, with over 80 US stores, nearly 300 International stores, and over 1,400 Nautica branded shop-in-shops worldwide. Customers can also shop on Nautica.com. Nautica is operated by SPARC Group LLC.
